value.verse: I will exalt you, O God my King, *
value.halfverse: and bless your Name for ever and ever.

value.verse: Every day will I bless you *
value.halfverse: and praise your Name for ever and ever.
there is no end to his greatness.
value.verse: Great is the LORD and greatly to be praised; *

value.halfverse: and shall declare your power.
value.verse: One generation shall praise your works to another *
I will ponder the glorious splendor of your majesty *
value.halfverse: and all your marvelous works.
and I will tell of your greatness.
value.verse: They shall speak of the might of your wondrous acts, *

value.halfverse: they shall sing of your righteous deeds.
value.verse: They shall publish the remembrance of your great goodness; *
The LORD is gracious and full of compassion, *
value.halfverse: slow to anger and of great kindness.
and his compassion is over all his works.
value.verse: The LORD is loving to everyone *
All your works praise you, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and your faithful servants bless you.

value.verse: They make known the glory of your kingdom *
value.halfverse: and speak of your power;

value.verse: That the peoples may know of your power *
value.halfverse: and the glorious splendor of your kingdom.

value.verse: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom; *
value.halfverse: your dominion endures throughout all ages.
and merciful in all his deeds.
value.verse: The LORD is faithful in all his words *
The LORD upholds all those who fall; *
value.halfverse: he lifts up those who are bowed down.

value.verse: The eyes of all wait upon you, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and you give them their food in due season.

value.verse: You open wide your hand *
value.halfverse: and satisfy the needs of every living creature.
and loving in all his works.
value.verse: The LORD is righteous in all his ways *
The LORD is near to those who call upon him, *
value.halfverse: to all who call upon him faithfully.
he hears their cry and helps them.
value.verse: He fulfills the desire of those who fear him; *
The LORD preserves all those who love him, *
value.halfverse: but he destroys all the wicked.
let all flesh bless his holy Name for ever and ever.
value.verse: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD; *
